import xarray as xr
import hvplot.xarray
import holoviews as hv
from bokeh.plotting import show

sfcmet = xr.open_zarr("https://icecaps-o.s3-ext.jc.rl.ac.uk/sfcmet/", consolidated=True)
sfcmet



hvfig = sfcmet['temperature at 2 meters'].sel(time=slice('2012-07-09', '2012-07-14')).hvplot(width=1000, grid=True)
p = hv.render(hvfig)
show(p)

(Fig1)=p
